channel.title: I need help connecting to other servers
channel.description: Everytime I try to connect to a server I always get the message that "Error connecting to server, must be down." Im positive that they are not Hamachi servers and they say that they are up on the server status page. I did everything that the stickys told me to do, I installed JDK and Reinstalled/Redownloaded Moparscape Client. I cannot figure this out, can someone help me?
